title: Stock Futures Hover, Oil Falls Ahead of Fed Decision
sub_head: Crude prices decline on expectations of a faster pullback in central-bank stimulus
body:
U.S. stock futures paused and oil prices fell ahead of a highly-anticipated Federal Reserve policy decision that is expected to clarify the central bankâ€™s plans to unwind stimulus measures.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 oscillated between small gains and losses, pointing to the broad-market index hovering after it closed down 0.8% Tuesday. It has retreated 1.7% this week. Nasdaq-100 futures and Dow Jones Industrial Average futures were also little changed.
